greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of set partitions of [n] into seven blocks with distinct sizes.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 28..1000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(t>i or t*(t+1)/2>n
mathematica: Table[a[n], {n, 28, 40}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 24 2018, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 01 2016
